info.description: Infrastructure Provisioning Service API for managing PostgreSQL clusters, Nginx instances, Docker services, and stacks
info.title: VCS Infrastructure Provisioning Service API

get.description: Check if the service is running

post.description: Create a new PostgreSQL cluster with specified number of nodes and WAL streaming replication

get.description: Get detailed information about a PostgreSQL cluster including nodes and endpoints

delete.description: Delete a PostgreSQL cluster and all its nodes

post.description: Start all nodes in the cluster
Stop all nodes in the cluster
Restart all nodes in the cluster
Scale the cluster by adding or removing replica nodes
Manually promote a replica node to become the new primary (failover)

get.description: Get the current replication status of all nodes
Get performance statistics for the cluster
Get logs from all nodes in the cluster
Get connection endpoints for write (primary) and read (replicas)

put.description: Update cluster configuration such as replication mode

get.description: List all users in the PostgreSQL cluster

post.description: Create a new user in the PostgreSQL cluster

delete.description: Delete a user from the PostgreSQL cluster

get.description: List all databases in the PostgreSQL cluster

post.description: Create a new database in the PostgreSQL cluster

delete.description: Delete a database from the PostgreSQL cluster

post.description: Create a new Nginx load balancer instance

get.description: Get detailed information about an Nginx instance

post.description: Add a domain to the Nginx configuration

delete.description: Remove a domain from the Nginx configuration

post.description: Add a routing rule to the Nginx configuration

get.description: Get the current security policy configuration

post.description: Configure security policies like rate limiting

get.description: Get access and error logs from Nginx

post.description: Create a new Docker container service

get.description: Get detailed information about a Docker service

delete.description: Delete a Docker service and its container

put.description: Update environment variables for the Docker service

get.description: Get logs from the Docker container
